title: Never Thought You’d Be This Kind of Hero! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Yaoi
tags: Animal Characteristics   Beastkin   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Demon Lord   Dense Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Fantasy World   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic Beasts   Money Grubber   Power Couple   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Selfish Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Shapeshifters   Sharing A Body   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   World Travel
author: ji Er Ji Jia   吉尔吉加
description:
Xu Jun finally defeated the BOSS–the Dark Demon King, in this stand-alone, virtual reality game. When he wanted to go out to browse Weibo and express his mood, he suddenly encountered a game BUG and immediately passes over to the game world.

He became the man who finally took down the Great Demon King in this world. Gratifying! The attention of millions of people!

……However, he did not know the development of this world was not the same as the game, the Demon King did not die, rather his soul entered into Xu Jun’s body; this Demon King knows of all the stupid things Xu Jun does everyday…….

[At the start, the Dark Demon King wanted this hero’s body.]
[Later, the Dark Demon King  “wanted” this small idiot’s  body.]>
